post.body: {Fist Bump} Scott. How are things in your neck of the woods?
Morning Ash. Shabbat Shalom sis :)
{Fist Bump} Shaun. G'morning bro.
It's great to have you among us Chris. Always knew there was good in you Master Jedi. :)
Don't let your PT find that out or you'll be doing boot camp all week.
Have 2 ask,mean no harm/foul, but how do we reconcile that w/the verse that says I have never seen His children begging bread?
That is off the hook freestyling.
It was good seeing ya today Amy. Thanks again for allowing Tom and I to hang out. It was an awesome time 4 me. Hope it was 4 him
Good choice Chris. Only choices better than that is #1. Follow Christ, and #2. Follow me on Twitter. ;)
In light of the SL marriage trend, I believe it would be a great idea to offer pre-marriage classes there as well.
Sorry Matt, even though I'm a Texas boy, I'm not a big Strait fan. Garth Brooks nowm that's different. :)
I agree Dave. I have trained myself to do just that when I start feeling that it all belongs to me.
I know. He so punks out sometimes. :) All I can do is pray for him, ya know?
went down fine I guess.
Leave Mark alone and sleep. ;)
Budget?! Throw away that thing and run up the bill to reach the lost. The bottem line is so much better. ;)
Just the way it went down.
Will do. BTW, it was nice meeting you yesterday. Kinda weird...but nice.
Use the Love story sell. Works for me. ;)
Good to "see" ya bro. Thanks for the follow love. How ya been buddy?
Did ya work Mark into the ground today?
Get well soon bro. Your in my prayers Tony.
Hey buddy, sry i didn't say morning back. I am just now getting on here. Been away for about a day.
Must have gone to Olive Garden. Wish I was there with ya Dave.
It can mean a # of things. Most often it means Oy Veah! ;) lol
Oy Veah!
CAREFULL! :) My Twitterpeeps will think your youngens are mine. Lol. :)
I follow the same Dave. Those that speak into me I love to follow.
I love that "crazy book" :)
It's all good Tanya. :)
You go Jeff!
I know that feeling. You'd think by the 3rd child I would have it figured out. Lol.
Have to say that I've missed hearing from ya the last few days. Is everything alright?
G'morning to you too Tanya and thanks. Time with some of my best friends is always a good time :)
Best pig hunting is done with a bow man. Ya'll heading down to West Texas?
Just grab a lite workout, some chic-fil-a, and ease on back home bro. I'll be praying for ya Perry.
Ya know I got nothing but love for ya bro, but what account is the real you? Need I wonder :)
very funny
G'night Chris. look fwd to hearing from ya tomorrow buddy.
Beal Street, Overton Square, the river...
How about Memphis Dave?
We meet at the Coffee Rush on the S/E conner of Gilbert and Baseline in Mesa.
Time to get ready for the Lifechurch.tv/Phoenix mens lifegroup. You guy's in the area feel free to come on by anytime between 7 and 9 am.
God has commanded us to pray. If we are to be obedient to His will, then prayer must be part of our life in Him. http://tinyurl.com/5jxhqc
"Pray for the peace of Jerusalem: They shall prosper that love you."Psalm 122:6 prosper - from the Hebrew, "shalav", meaning "to be at rest"
RT @hardlynormal 2day man in wheelchair didn't have coat, so did many others. GREAT need 4 coats @ Burbank Shelter. ya got one?
A great idea and such an easy way to help kids. Please get involved with me. http://tinyurl.com/44erqq
Almost forgot. Shabbat Shalom to all my Twitterpeeps. We're so blessed by God to be given a day of rest from work. Let's rest N Him everyday
RT: @ScottWilliams New Post "Who Should I Follow On Twitter?" at BigIsTheNewSmall.com Please Retweet: http://bit.ly/71FU
Going for a power nap. Going to be a long night at work (my mission field). Hope to have more time tomorrow on here.
Be back later. Going to trade in a movie.
RT: @phxrscuemission 68 families left 2adopt 4 Christmas. Deadline end of TODAY, please call 602 346 3338 to sponsor a family or more info
Time to head out into the mission field. Pray that God will use me tonight for His Glory. G'nite Twitterland.
Out the door for Mens Lifegroup @ CoffeeRush in Mesa AZ. Gilbert & Baseline. Hope to see my AZ men there.
Time 2 get ready 4 the Lifechurch.tv/Phoenix mens Lifegroup this morning. AZ men feel free 2 stop by. CoffeRush @ Gilbert and Baseline Mesa.
Good morning Twitterworld! {Fist Bump} my people.
Heading off to bed ya'll. "See" ya'll in a few hrs. G'night my Twitterpeeps. Love ya'll.
If any of my followpeeps aren't following @ScottWilliams you have no idea what your missing. Show my good friend some Twitter love ya'll.
Retweet: @michaelharrison BIG THOUGHT FROM EARLIER TODAY: Create a revolution by serving people. - Dino Rizzo
Anyone else notice I got no responses when I asked what was given away on Christmas?
